titleStmt.title: To the right honourable, the lord mayor, and common-council of the city of London. Peter Caponi citizen of Florence, sendeth greeting.
titleStmt.author: Caponi, Peter.

notesStmt.note: N.B. Charles VIII of France (1470-1498) invaded Florence in 1494 and 1495.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
